mapper.select: SELECT L_ID FROM( SELECT L_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY L_ID DESC) AS RNUM FROM LETTER_TB ORDER BY L_ID DESC ) WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT A.*, PJ2.JOIN_FLAG FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT L.L_ID , L.L_MESSAGE , L.L_FLAG , L.L_TITLE , TO_CHAR(L.L_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "L_DATE" , LR1.U_ID "sender_id" , P.PARTY_ID , P.PARTY_TITLE , LR2.SEND_FLAG , PJ.PARTY_HOST FROM LETTERING_TB LR1,LETTERING_TB LR2, PARTY_TB P JOIN PICKJOIN_TB PJ ON P.PARTY_ID = PJ.PARTY_ID AND PJ.U_ID = #{u_id} JOIN PICKJOIN_TB PJ2 ON P.PARTY_ID = PJ2.PARTY_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN LETTER_TB L ON L.L_TITLE LIKE P.PARTY_TITLE || '%' WHERE L.L_ID = #{l_id} AND L.L_ID = LR1.L_ID AND LR1.SEND_FLAG = 1 AND LR2.SEND_FLAG = 0 AND LR2.U_ID = #{u_id} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN PICKJOIN_TB PJ2 ON A."sender_id" = PJ2.U_ID AND A.PARTY_ID = PJ2.PARTY_ID

mapper.select: SELECT L_ID, U_ID, L_MESSAGE, L_FLAG, L_TITLE, SEND_FLAG, "sender_id", "l_date" FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.L_ID, LR1.U_ID, L.L_MESSAGE, L.L_FLAG, L.L_TITLE, LR1.SEND_FLAG, LR2.U_ID "sender_id", TO_CHAR(L.L_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "l_date" FROM LETTER_TB L, LETTERING_TB LR1, LETTERING_TB LR2 WHERE LR1.U_id = #{u_id} AND L.L_ID = LR1.L_ID AND LR1.L_ID = LR2.L_ID AND LR1.SEND_FLAG = 0 AND LR2.SEND_FLAG = 1 ORDER BY L.L_ID DESC ) A WHERE 1 = 1 ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{displayPost} AND #{displayPost} + #{postNum}-1

SELECT L_ID, U_ID, L_MESSAGE, L_FLAG, L_TITLE, SEND_FLAG, "sender_id", "l_date" FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.L_ID, LR1.U_ID, L.L_MESSAGE, L.L_FLAG, L.L_TITLE, LR2.SEND_FLAG, LR2.U_ID "sender_id", TO_CHAR(L.L_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "l_date" FROM LETTER_TB L, LETTERING_TB LR1, LETTERING_TB LR2 WHERE LR2.U_id = #{u_id} AND L.L_ID = LR1.L_ID AND LR1.L_ID = LR2.L_ID AND LR1.SEND_FLAG = 0 AND LR2.SEND_FLAG = 1 ORDER BY L.L_ID DESC ) A WHERE 1 = 1 ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{displayPost} AND #{displayPost} + #{postNum} -1
